entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is mentioned as having a conversation with his uncle.

entities.name: hestia jones
entities.description: Hestia Jones is a wizard who is capable of handling tasks. She is mentioned alongside Dedalus Diggle in the context of being able to handle something.

entities.name: dedalus diggle
entities.description: Dedalus Diggle is a wizard who is capable of handling tasks. He is mentioned alongside Hestia Jones in the context of being able to handle something.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who is responsible for accidents and deaths. He is mentioned as someone who kills Muggles for fun.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are people who do not have magical powers. They are mentioned as being killed by Voldemort for fun.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are creatures that cause fogs. They are mentioned in the context of causing fogs.

relationships.description: Harry believes Voldemort is responsible for accidents and deaths.
Hestia Jones and Dedalus Diggle are comparable to each other in terms of their capabilities.
